rows.title: National Child Helpline

description.eng: This helpline is free, available 24/7, and connects you with a professional that can help.

rows.description: This helpline is free, available 24/7, and connects you with a professional that can help.

rows.title: Alcoholics Anonymous (AA)

description.eng: AA supports men and women to help them recover from alcoholism. This service is free and completely anonymous.

rows.description: AA supports men and women to help them recover from alcoholism. This service is free and completely anonymous.

rows.title: Tanzania Legal Aid (TANLAP)

description.eng: TANLAP connects you to groups providing affordable legal aid in Tanzania.

rows.description: TANLAP connects you to groups providing affordable legal aid in Tanzania.

rows.title: Women's Legal Aid Centre

description.eng: WLC is a non-profit organisation that helps to empower women to secure their rights across Tanzania.

rows.description: WLC is a non-profit organisation that helps to empower women to secure their rights across Tanzania.

rows.title: Counselling and Family Life Organisation (CAFLO)

description.eng: CAFLO offers counseling, empowerment and advocacy for families in Tanzania.

rows.description: CAFLO offers counseling, empowerment and advocacy for families in Tanzania.

rows.title: Mental Health Association of Tanzania

description.eng: Professional organisation with a long history of supporting mental health services in Tanzania.

rows.description: Professional organisation with a long history of supporting mental health services in Tanzania.

rows.title: Tap Elderly Women's Wisdom for Youth (TEWWY)

title.eng: Tap Elderly Women's Wisdom for Youth (TEWWY)

description.eng: TEWWY has local Wisdom & Wellness Counselors who provide free and accessible mental health services, support and resources in their communities.

rows.description: TEWWY has local Wisdom & Wellness Counselors who provide free and accessible mental health services, support and resources in their communities.

rows.title: TEWWY's Mental Health Q&A booklet

description.eng: This booklet answers some common questions about mental health and provides information that could be helpful for you or your loved one.
